name: Perry Jones
description: I’m easy going, enjoy meeting new people. I’m quiet until I get to know someone. My relationship with God is a part of who I am. I love spending time with my love one. I’m honest & caring & want to meet someone with integrity & a generous heart. Trust & honesty are very important to me, I’m not a game player. I’m a romantic at heart, want to be shown tenderness & treated with respect. I love to show & receive affection whether it’s holding hands while walking down the beach or through the mall, hugging & snuggling in front of a fire & sharing special moments together.
